intro: Podochilus hellwigii, commonly known as the Hellwig's orchid, is a species of orchid native to Southeast Asia. It is characterized by its upright growth habit and produces clusters of fragrant, white to pale yellow flowers. The plant typically grows in forested areas with high humidity and partial shade.
